alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:31AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches with locally greater amounts up to 5 inches through tonight. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Additional and heavier snow along with the greater impacts expected Wednesday and Wednesday night. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Jemez Mountains and Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow may reduce visibility below one-half mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Jemez Mountains
